Title: Relates to requiring health insurance companies to provide and store health proxy forms for the insured
Summary: Requires health insurance companies to provide health proxy forms to the insured and to store completed proxies on behalf of the insured; requires the department of social services to provide health proxy forms and instructions to persons applying for Medicaid.
LawCode: Amd ยง3217-a, add ยง3242, Ins L; amd ยง366-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurance companies to provide health care proxy forms to the insured and to store completed proxies on behalf of the insured and to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring the department of social services to provide health care proxy forms and instructions to applicants for Medicaid
